title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 81.15 - Salvage vehicles prior to september 1, 1981
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 81.15 - Salvage vehicles prior to september 1, 1981

State Regulations

Any vehicle for which an MV-907 has been issued shall not
fall under these regulations but shall be controlled by this Part as it existed
on August 31, 1981. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
81.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
